attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: I recommend if you‚Äôd like a functional app that helps your day to day life that you NOT download this app. Not only do I HATE the display and editing of the app in itself, but the designer had the WORST taste in internet design and education. attributes.title: absolutely terrible. DO NOT BUY!!!
attributes.review: Considering how powerful this app could be, I was immensely disappointed when I had come to realize that it is absolute trash. This app is in no way beneficial to any trump supporter or otherwise. It has countless glitches, ads, and it was simply very difficult to do anything that it was made for. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: Wow this app really should be taken DOWN!!! Not only did all my hair fall out but an old man came up to me slapping his fish and eating his foot. But also my cat was swung from the ceiling fan and fell in my lake. But then the app spilt my soap and kissed my left knee after I ate 40 sticks of fried butter!!! Then my phone was taken by FBI agents and assaulted in the airport. Then oh hey guess what I left a Pringle chip on my front step LMAOOOOOOOOOO hopefully they delete his app

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if i could

attributes.title: terrible app....do not download

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP CRASHED MY PHONE

I lost years of photos with my dear children and all of my contacts. This app is the worst thing that has ever happened to me

attributes.title: terrible
